nodes.text: Outpost Talarn was an outpost owned by House Thul in the Juran Mountains on Alderaan and affiliated to the Sith Empire. during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. At this outpost were stationed Dathis Elgin, Medical Officer Willem, N5-R3, Officer Jeral Vesk, Sergeant Pratt, Sergeant Tegan.
